ComicInfo.Title: The Coachman; Coal Eater; The Sad Ballad of Brash Billy Barton
ComicInfo.Summary:
Skeletal outlaws! Demonic coachmen! Quick drawing masked monsters!
Step back in time with us to the haunted Old West where the monsters aren't just the outlaws. Three new terrifying tales of two-gun justice and creature carnage are on tap told in glorious stark black & white! G.O. Parsons (writer of the Willy's Wonderland Movie) and Jason Craig (Freddy vs Jason vs Ash) deliver a devil's bargain that will leave you dying for more in "The Coachman". Strap on your spurs and load the silver bullets - these stories are going to leave scars!
